name: baby boo
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Best way to say happy birthday to the love of your life
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I am thankful for God for putting you in my life, and on this earth 21 years ago today
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
